articles.author: Lawrence Hurley
articles.title: Supreme Court blocks ruling that would undermine the Voting Rights Act - NBC News
articles.description: The Supreme Court blocked an appeals court ruling that would gut a key provision of the Voting Rights Act in a case brought by Native American tribes challenging a North Dakota legislative map.
articles.content:
WASHINGTON The Supreme Court on Thursday blocked an appeals court ruling that would gut a key provision of the Voting Rights Act.
The decision grants an application brought by Native American tribes… [+2635 chars]
